title: SCI-FI Guitars (Industrial Music Loops For Level Design)
description: WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 ! Welcome To SCI-FI Guitars (Industrial Music Loops For Level Design) Game Developer & Production Music Pack!
longDescription:
SCI-FI Guitars brings you a pack that has been crafted for menu style music & in-game level music, screen titles/background music for your Unreal Project. Bring your game to life with our intense atmospheres crafted in this mega guitar asset! WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 !

🎮

PURCHASES & FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  • When You Buy our products they are formatted in WAV audio files/CUES. Customers have enquired about other formats such as MP3 to which are not available.
  • All Music is downloaded directly from the UNREAL ASSET STORE after Purchase.
  • When we submit to UNREAL ENGINE MARKETPLACE our products are packaged as WAV/CUE
  • See TECHNICAL INFORMATION for more details about our products before buying.

🎮

LISTEN TO SCI-FI Guitars (Industrial Music Loops For Level Design) HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-guitars-preview/s-3AD8rw0dcR7
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  All music created for seamless/Smooth audio transitions between levels in your game.
  •  Tempo/BPM 90
  •  Mixed & Mastered/HD Audio

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 42 minutes 10 Seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-guitars-preview/s-3AD8rw0dcR7

Important/Additional Notes: Please Email us for customer enquires & additional questions related to our products @ cerberus_audio@outlook.com
